title: Pupil Attainment
notes: Number of pupils who attained a given number of qualifications by level and stage.

title: Alcohol Related Hospital Discharges
notes: Number and European Age-sex Standardised Rates (EASRs) of general acute inpatient and day case discharges with an alcohol-related diagnosis.

title: Business - Births, Deaths and Survival Rates
notes: Number and rate (per 10,000 adults) of VAT/PAYE registrations, de-registrations and business survival rates

title: Earnings
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Mean and median gross weekly earnings (Â£s) by gender, working pattern and workplace/residence measure.

title: Economic Inactivity
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Economic inactivity level and rate by gender

title: House Prices
notes: Value of residential property transactions

title: Regional Gross Value Added (GVA)
notes: Regional Gross Value Added (GVA)  by local authority area by year

title: Job Related Training
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Number, and percent, of people receiving job related training in the last 3 months.

title: School Leaver Destinations - Follow Up
notes: Number, and percent, of school leavers by destination from follow up survey

title: Natural Features (National Indicator)
notes: Percent of natural features, on protected nature sites, in favourable condition

title: National Performance Framework
notes: Data underlying the National Performance Framework Indicators. These give a measure of national wellbeing including a range of economic, social and environmental indicators.

title: Road Vehicles
notes: Road vehicle numbers, household car ownership and fuel consumption

title: Low Birthweight
notes: Number, and percent, of low birthweight (less than 2500g) babies (single births).

title: Income Support Claimants
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Number of income support claimants by age and gender (age split not available for gender).

title: Child Benefit - Children
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Geographical analysis of Child Benefit at small area levels. Number of children in a live Child Benefit award as at 31st August.

title: Terrestrial Breeding Birds
notes: Index of abundance of terrestrial breeding birds (1994=100)

title: Healthy Life Expectancy
notes: Years of Healthy Life Expectancy (including confidence intervals) by age, sex, deprivation, and urban rural classification

title: Buildings at Risk Register
notes: Percent of A-listed buildings on the Buildings at Risk Register (BARR)

title: Disability Living Allowance
notes: Number of Disability Living Allowance claimants by age group and gender.

title: Recorded Crimes and Offences
notes: Number, and rate per 10,000 population, of crimes and offences recorded by the police

title: Emergency Repeat Admissions
notes: Percent of people aged 65+ who are admitted as an emergency to hospitals at least twice within 12 months.

title: Home Care Services
notes: Number of hours of home care provided by local authority, and number of clients receiving home care from LA and private/voluntary providers.

title: Scottish Housing Quality Standard (SHQS)
notes: Indicators from the Scottish House Condition Survey (SHCS)

title: Infant Deaths
notes: Number of infant deaths (stillbirth, perinatal and those aged under 1 year old).

title: Home Care Clients
notes: Number and rate per 1,000 population of home care clients by age and gender.

title: Standard Geography Code Register
notes: The geography Entities (levels such as Council Area - S12) and Instances (areas such as Glasgow City - S12000046)

title: Looked After Children
notes: Information about the number of looked after children by type of care setting.

title: Local Authority Housing Council Housing
notes: Number of lettings, evictions and abandonments of local authority housing.

title: House Sales
notes: Number of house sales

title: Annual Business Survey
notes: Financial and employment data by broad industry by year. Annual Business Survey (ABS) provides data mainly on the Production (including Manufacturing), Construction and Service Sectors in Scotland. The statistics are best suited to the analysis of individual industries rather than the economy as a whole.

title: Measles Mumps Rubella (MMR) Immunisation
notes: Number, and percent of, children who were immunised against measles, mumps and rubella by 5 years of age

title: Population Estimates - Census 2001
notes: Population from Census Day, 29 April 2001 (number of people).

title: Business Demography - Births and Deaths
notes: Number and rate (per 10,000 adults) of VAT/PAYE registrations and de-registrations.

title: Hospital Admissions
notes: Number of admissions to non-psychiatric/non-obstetric hospitals in Scotland.

title: School Pupil Census
notes: Information from the School Pupil Census

title: School Attendance Rate
notes: Attendance rate of pupils attending publicly funded schools

title: Employment and Support Allowance
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Number of Employment and Support Allowance claimants by age, gender, and ethnicity.

title: Community Orders
notes: Number of Social Work Orders given by type, age, gender, employment status and ethnicity.

title: Social Work Orders Commenced
notes: Number of social work orders commenced in each local authority area from 2004-05 onwards, broken down by type of order

title: Organisations
notes: A dataset with all of the organisations involved in creating and publishing statistics on this site.

title: Business Site Counts
notes: Number of business sites by sector and employee size band by SIC 2007.

title: Business Stocks and Sites
notes: Number and rate (per 10,000 adults) of VAT/PAYE registered stocks and sites operating in Scotland.

title: Carbon Footprint
notes: Greenhouse gas emissions that are associated with the consumption by Scottish residents on goods and services and by private heating and motoring

title: Primary 1 Children Body Mass Index - Clinical
notes: Percent of children who are classed as healthy weight, overweight, obese or severely obese at their Primary 1 review.

title: Home Care Client Group
notes: Number of home care clients by care type or disability. Number and rate per 1,000 population of home care clients by disability/condition

title: Care Homes: Occupancy Rate
notes: Occupancy rate in care homes, for different main client groups and across care sectors

title: Deaths
notes: Numbers of deaths registered by cause.

title: Travel to Work and Other Purposes
notes: Statistics on what mode of transport (walking, cycling, car, bus, train) people usually use to get to work and education, purposes of journeys made by Scottish people.

title: Crime Clear up Rates
notes: Crimes cleared up by the police as a percentage of those recorded.

title: Care Homes: Places
notes: The number and ratio (per 1000 adults) of registered places in care homes, for different main client groups and across care sectors

title: Dwellings per Hectare
notes: Number of dwellings per hectare.

title: Concessionary Travel Cards
notes: Number of concessionary cards issued to all adults, and adults aged over 60

title: Criminal Justice Social Work Reports
notes: Number of criminal justice social work reports (CJSWRs) by various characteristics. These were formerly (prior to 2011) called Social Enquiry Reports.

title: Travel times to key services by car or public transport
notes: Travel times (minutes) to key services by car or public transport

title: Primary 1 BMI Distribution
notes: Number of P1 BMI Reviews. Clinical and Epidemiological category measurements are provided in separate datasets.

title: Breached Order Applications
notes: Number of breaches applications for social work orders by order type.

title: Community Payback Orders: Breach Applications
notes: Breach applications during the life of Community Payback Orders which were completed/terminated in each year from 2012-13, by gender.

title: Cancer Registrations (1997 to 2009)
notes: Number of cancer registrations by type and gender.

title: Greenhouse Gas Emissions
notes: This contains the results of the Scottish Greenhouse Gas Inventory, which is the key tool for understanding the origins and magnitudes of greenhouse emissions

title: Derelict and Urban Vacant Land
notes: Area of Derelict and Urban Vacant Land (hectares)

title: Primary 1 Children Body Mass Index - Epidemiological
notes: Percent of children who are classed as healthy weight, overweight, obese or severely obese at their Primary 1 review.

title: Home Care Client Living Arrangements
notes: Number and rate per 1,000 population of home care clients by living arrangement

title: Historical Population Estimates (pre-2001, historical geographic boundaries)
notes: Historical estimates by gender and age (pre-2001)

title: Dependency Ratio
notes: The population of children (aged 0 to 15) and older people (aged 65 and over) expressed as a percentage of people aged 16 to 64

title: Employment
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Employment level and rate by age and gender.

title: Births
notes: Number of births by gender that were registered in a calendar year, or occurred in a mid-year period (1 July to 30 June).

title: Economic Activity
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Economic activity level and rate by gender

title: Pupil Attainment (English and Maths)
notes: Number of pupils who attained gained awards in English and Maths at SCQF Level 3 or above.

title: Urban Rural Classification (6-Fold)
notes: Urban Rural Classification (6-Fold)

title: Geographic Area - 2001 Census
notes: Geographic Area - 2001 Census

title: Land Area (based on 2001 Data Zones)
notes: Land area in hectares based on aggregating 2001 Data Zone data.

title: Population living in close proximity to a derelict site
notes: Percent of people living within 500 metres of a derelict site.

title: Reconvictions
notes: Reconviction rates by offenders' gender and age

title: Places in Care Homes with En-Suite Facilities
notes: Percentage of places in Care Homes which have ensuite facilities

title: Pension Credits
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Number of Pension Credit claimants by age and gender.

title: State Retirement Pension
notes: Number of State Pension claimants by age and gender.

title: School Leaver Destinations Initial
notes: Number, and percent, of school leavers by destination from initial survey

title: Breastfeeding
notes: Number, and percentage of, babies being breastfed or exclusively breastfed by review stage.

title: Court Process Times
notes: Percentage of summary criminal cases dealt with within 26 weeks.

title: Full-Time and Part-Time Employment
notes: Number and percentage of people in full time and part time employment (aged 16+)

title: Intensive Home Care
notes: Percent of people aged 65+ with high levels of care needs who are cared for at home

title: Municipal Waste
notes: Municipal Waste (tonnes) and arising per capita (kgs)

title: Probation Orders By Length
notes: Number of probation orders commenced by length.

title: DTP/Pol/Hib Immunisation
notes: Number, and percent, of children who have completed their primary immunisation course of the DTP/Pol/Hib vaccine by 24 months of age. Also known as the '5-in-1' vaccination.

title: Working Age Claimants Of Key Benefits
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Number of working age claimants of key benefits by age

title: Generation and Management of Household Waste
notes: Household waste presented by waste category and method of management

title: Poverty
notes: The number and proportions of people living in private households with an equivalised income of less than 60% of the UK median before housing costs.

title: Poverty (all people)
notes: Official Statistics of the number and proportions of people in poverty. Various poverty measures and breakdowns are available.

title: Ante-Natal Smoking
notes: Number and percentage of mothers reporting their smoking status at ante-natal booking visit in the community or at hospital.

title: Road Casualties
notes: Number of people killed and seriously injured on Scotland's roads by age and gender.

title: Social Work Staffing
notes: Number, and WTE, of social work staff by gender

title: Scottish Health Survey
notes: Indicators of population health and related risk factors from the Scottish Health Survey.

title: Scottish Health Survey-Scotland level data
notes: Indicators of population health and related risk factors from the Scottish Health Survey (2008-2019).

title: Incapacity Benefit and Severe Disablement Claimants
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Number of people claiming incapacity benefits and/or severe disablement allowance

title: Unemployment Model Based Estimates
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Unemployment Model Based Estimates (level and rate)

title: Places In Single Rooms In Care Homes
notes: Percentage of single room places in Care Homes by type of provision.

title: Council House Sales
notes: Number of council house sales to sitting tenants by housing type.

title: Care Homes: Number of Homes
notes: The number of care homes for different main client groups and across care sectors

title: Supervised Attendance Orders By Length
notes: Number of supervised attendance orders commenced by length

title: Never Worked
notes: Number, and percent, of people aged 16+ who have never had a paid or unpaid job

title: Pupil Attainment (Additional Support Needs)
notes: Number of pupils with additional support needs (ASN) who attained a given number of qualifications by level and stage.

title: Drug Related Hospital Discharge
notes: Number and European Age-sex Standardised Rates (EASRs) of general acute inpatient and day case stays with a drug-related diagnosis.

title: Income And Poverty Modelled Estimates
notes: This dataset includes information about estimated household income, and percent of households with low incomes.

title: Dwellings by Type
notes: Number of dwellings by type

title: Outdoor Visits (National Indicator)
notes: Percent of adults making one or more visits to the outdoors per week

title: Road Transport Expenditure
notes: Local and central government transport expenditure

title: Job Seeker's Allowance Claimants
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Number, and percent, of people claiming Job Seeker's Allowance by gender and age.

title: Dwellings by Council Tax Band
notes: Number of dwellings by Council Tax band, and percentage of dwellings in each Council Tax band.

title: Dwellings by Number of Rooms
notes: Number of dwellings by number of rooms within the dwelling

title: Public Transport
notes:
Number of bus passenger journeys and bus vehicle kilometres on all services, passenger train stations and satisfaction with public transport. 

Figures for the convenience of public transport are from the Scottish Household Survey (SHS).  Note that the public convenience data is no longer updated as the question was withdrawn from the survey.

title: Attendance Allowance
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Number of people claiming Attendance Allowance by age, gender and rate of award

title: Qualifications of working age adults
notes: Percent of people with a given highest qualification level.

title: Disability Living Allowance (Care Component)
notes: Number of Disability Living Allowance claimants by lev of Care Component

title: Fuel Poverty (Scottish House Condition Survey)
notes: Number of households in fuel poverty and extreme fuel poverty by selected dwelling and household characteristics.

title: Child Dental Health
notes: Percentage of P1 children in Scotland with no obvious decay experience.

title: Age of First Time Mothers
notes: Number and percentage of first time mothers who are aged 19 and under, or 35 and over.

title: Renewable Electricity
organization: Department for Business, Energy & Industrial Strategy
notes: Electricity generated by renewables as a percentage of gross consumption

title: Not in Employment, Education or Training (NEET)
notes: Number, and percent, of young people (16-19) who were not in education, employment or training.

title: Household Estimates
notes: Number and percentage of total dwellings that are occupied, vacant, unoccupied and exempt from paying council tax, long-term empty, second homes, are occupied and exempt from paying council tax, and that are receiving Single Adult Council Tax discount.  An 'occupied dwelling' is roughly equivalent to a household.

title: Energy Consumption
organization: Department for Business, Energy & Industrial Strategy
notes: Consumption (GWh) by energy type and energy customer type

title: Road Network and Traffic
notes: Road network traffic, perceptions of congestion and road condition

title: Number of HMO Licences in Force
notes: Number of House in Multiple Occupation (HMO) Licences in force at 31 March.

title: End of Life Care
notes: The percentage of last 6 months of life spent at home or in a community setting

title: Gender Pay Gap
notes: The difference between male and female median earnings (gross hourly earnings excluding overtime) as a percentage of male earnings.

title: Dwellings In Flood Risk Areas
notes: Number of dwellings in flood risk areas

title: Police Officer Quarterly Strength
notes: Number of Full-Time Equivalent (FTE) police officers in Scotland at the end of each respective quarter.

title: Greenhouse Gas Emissions by Source Sector (Historical categories)
notes: This contains the results of the Scottish Greenhouse Gas Inventory, which is the key tool for understanding the origins and magnitudes of greenhouse emissions.  This presentation uses the sectoral classifications used in the main publication prior to the June 2020 publication.

title: Carbon Footprint Breakdown
notes: Greenhouse gas emissions that are associated with the consumption by Scottish residents on goods and services and by private heating and motoring

title: Mental Wellbeing - Scottish Surveys Core Questions
notes: Mental wellbeing by tenure, household type, age, sex and disability. The Scottish Survey Core Questions is an innovative project drawing together multiple household surveys to provide a large sample for subnational analysis.

title: Unpaid Care Provision - Scottish Surveys Core Questions
notes: Unpaid care provision by tenure, household type, age, sex and disability. The Scottish Survey Core Questions is an innovative project drawing together multiple household surveys to provide a large sample for subnational analysis.

title: General Health - Scottish Surveys Core Questions
notes: Self-assessed general health by tenure, household type, age, sex and disability. The Scottish Survey Core Questions is an innovative project drawing together multiple household surveys to provide a large sample for subnational analysis.

title: Smoking - Scottish Survey Core Questions
notes: Current smokers by Current smokers by tenure, household type, age, sex and disability. The Scottish Survey Core Questions is an innovative project drawing together multiple household surveys to provide a large sample for subnational analysis.

title: Disability - Scottish Surveys Core Questions
notes:
Percentage of adults reporting a limiting long term physical or mental health problem, by age, gender, household type, and type of housing tenure.
The Scottish Survey Core Questions is an innovative project drawing together multiple household surveys to provide a large sample for subnational analysis.

title: Confidence in Policing - Scottish Survey Core Questions
notes: Confidence across six policing functions by tenure, household type, sex and disability. The Scottish Survey Core Questions is an innovative project drawing together multiple household surveys to provide a large sample for subnational analysis.

title: Perceptions of Local Crime - Scottish Surveys Core Questions
notes: Perceptions of the local crime rate by tenure, household type, sex and disability. The Scottish Survey Core Questions is an innovative project drawing together multiple household surveys to provide a large sample for subnational analysis.

title: Debt Arrangement Scheme (DAS)
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: The number of Debt Arrangement Scheme (DAS) Debt Payment Programmes approved. DAS is a statutory debt management solution administered by Accountant in Bankruptcy (AiB)

title: Personal Insolvency
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Personal insolvencies in Scotland (awards of bankruptcy and Protected Trust Deeds).

title: Corporate Insolvency
notes: Scottish registered companies becoming insolvent or entering receivership.

title: Alcohol use ever among young people (SALSUS)
notes: The percentage of 13 and 15 year olds who have ever drunk alcohol.

title: Drug use behaviour among young people (SALSUS)
notes: Drug use among 13 and 15 year olds in Scotland.

title: Drinking behaviour among young people (SALSUS)
notes: When 13 and 15 year olds last had an alcoholic drink.

title: Smoking prevalence in young people (SALSUS)
notes: Smoking prevalence among 13 and 15 year olds in Scotland.

title: New Build Housing Starts and Completions
notes: Quarterly time series data on Scottish approvals, starts and completions by sector

title: Dwellings Median Number Of Rooms
notes: The median number of rooms in dwellings for data zones, council areas and Scotland.

title: Scottish Index of Multiple Deprivation - Crime Indicators
notes: The most recent Scottish Index of Multiple Deprivation (SIMD) was published in January 2020. This dataset contains the indicators that were used to calculate SIMD 2016 and SIMD 2020 crime domains.

title: Land Area (based on 2011 Data Zones)
notes: Land area in hectares based on aggregating 2011 Data Zone data.

title: Affordable Housing Supply Programme
notes: Quarterly Scotland figures for the Affordable Housing Supply Programme approvals, starts and completions, split by category, form of housing supply, and type of housing supply from 2000-01 to the latest quarter.

title: Scottish Index of Multiple Deprivation - Geographic Access to Services Indicators
notes: Mean travel time (in minutes) to key services, by car or public transport. This dataset contains indicators  used to calculate the geographic access to services domains of SIMD 2016 and SIMD 2020.

title: Scottish Index of Multiple Deprivation - Employment Indicators
notes: The number and percentage of people who are employment deprived

title: Scottish Index of Multiple Deprivation - Income Indicators
notes: The number and percentage of people claiming relevant benefits. This dataset contains the indicators that were used to calculate the income domain of the 2016 Scottish Index of Multiple Deprivation.

title: Children in Low Income Families
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: The number and percentage of children living in families in receipt of Child Tax Credit (CTC) whose reported income is less than 60 per cent of the median income or in receipt of Income Support (IS) or Income-Based Jobseekers Allowance (JSA).

title: Population Estimates (Current Geographic Boundaries)
notes: Mid-year population estimates. Higher geographies are aggregated from 2011 Data Zones.

title: Population Estimates Summary (Current Geographic Boundaries)
notes: Mid-year population estimates. Higher geographies are aggregated from 2011 Data Zones.

title: Social Work Orders Terminated
notes: Number of social work orders completed/terminated in each local authority area from 2004-05 onwards, broken down by type of order and whether successfully completed.

title: Number of General Practices with Registered Patients
notes: Data indicates the number of general practices (GP surgeries) by area as at 1 October for each year presented.

title: Headcount of General Practice Workforce
notes: Data indicates headcount of GP workforce by Health Board and Local Authority as at 30 September for each year presented.

title: General Practice List Size
notes: Data indicates patients registered with practices by Health Board and Local Authority as at 1 October for each year presented.

title: New clients presenting at specialist drug treatment services (SDMD)
notes: Individuals presenting for initial assessment (for new drug treatment episode) at specialist drug treatment services, and for whom a SMR25a form was submitted to Scottish Drug Misuse Database (SDMD). Selected breakdowns by age, gender, illicit drug, prescribed drug and whether or not client injects.

title: Scottish Welfare Fund Expenditure
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Expenditure for awards paid out for the Scottish Welfare Fund

title: Scottish Welfare Fund Applications
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Number of applications received for Community Care Grants and Crisis Grants for the Scottish Welfare Fund

title: Population Estimates (Historical Geographic Boundaries)
notes: Mid-year population estimates. Higher geographies are aggregated from 2001 Data Zones.

title: Delayed Discharges - Monthly Census
notes: Number of delays by length of delay and reason for delay at the monthly census point.

title: Household Tenure - Scottish Survey Core Questions
notes: The way in which the household occupies their accomodation. The Scottish Survey Core Questions is an innovative project drawing together multiple household surveys to provide a large sample for subnational analysis.

title: Local Level Average Household Income Estimates 2014
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Mean and median gross household income estimates at Data Zone level for 2014

title: Local Level Distribution of Household Income Estimates 2014
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Gross household income distribution estimates at Data Zone level for 2014

title: Smoking behaviour and self-rated health (SALSUS)
notes: Self-assessed general health by smoking status, age, and gender

title: Drug use behaviour and deprivation (SALSUS)
notes: Deprivation by drug use behaviour, age, and gender

title: Drinking behaviour and emotional and behavioural problems (SALSUS)
notes: Emotional and behavioural problems, by drinking behaviour, age, and gender

title: Mid-Year Household Estimates
notes: The number of households in each council area and in Scotland

title: Average Household Size
notes: The average number of people per household in each council area and in Scotland

title: Household Type
notes: The number of households of different types in Scotland (i.e. 2 adult household)

title: Crime Victimisation Rate (National Indicator)
notes: Proportion of people in Scotland who have been the victim of one or more crimes in the past year

title: Local Crime Rate (National Indicator)
notes: Percent of respondents who believe that crime has stayed the same or reduced in the past 2 years in their local area

title: Perception of Neighbourhood (National Indicator)
notes: Percent of people who rate their neighbourhood as a very good place to live

title: Neighbourhood rating - Scottish Household Survey
notes: How adults in Scotland rate their local neighbourhood as a place to live, from the Scottish Household Survey (SHS)

title: Council Tax Collection Rates
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Data on Council Tax amounts billed and collected, up to the end of the most recent complete billing year

title: Regional Domestic Tourism
notes: Domestic tourism statistics by region and year. All figures come from the Great Britain Tourism Survey (GBTS) and represent 3-year annual averages due to small sample sizes on regional level.

title: Smoking prevalence and deprivation (SALSUS)
notes: Deprivation by smoking behaviour, age and gender

title: Gross Domestic Product: Annual Output by Industry
notes: The value of goods and services produced annually, reported as an index (chainlinked volume measure)

title: Gross Domestic Product: Quarterly Output by Industry
notes: The value of goods and services produced quarterly

title: Tourism Day Visits - Activities
notes: The Great Britain Day Visits Survey measures the visits and expenditure of tourism day visitors to Scotland.

title: Scottish Accommodation Occupancy
notes: The Scottish Accommodation Occupancy Survey (SAOS) gathers and analyses data on occupancy levels in hotels, guest houses, B&Bs, self-catering, hostels and caravan & camping parks.

title: Tourism Day Visits - Demographics
notes: The Great Britain Day Visits Survey measures the visits and expenditure of tourism day visitors to Scotland.

title: Tourism Day Visits - Location
notes: The Great Britain Day Visits Survey measures the visits and expenditure of tourism day visitors to Scotland.

title: Tourism Day Visits - Transport
notes: The Great Britain Day Visits Survey measures the visits and expenditure of tourism day visitors to Scotland.

title: Temporary Accommodation Statistics
notes: These figures show a snapshot figure of the number of households in Temporary Accommodation per local authority at 31st March each year.

title: Fire - Type of Incident
notes: Number of fires, by type of fire and whether accidental or not

title: Bus Accessibility
notes: The indicator gives a score for the availability and frequency of bus service in each data zone.

title: Homelessness Applications
notes: Summary figures of 1) all homelessness applications to local authorities each financial year in Scotland, 2) the total number of these assessed as homeless or threatened with homelessness.

title: Housing Lists
notes: Total number of applications on waiting lists and transfer lists for a local authority dwelling

title: Local Authority Housing Stock by Normal Use
notes: Local Authority owned housing stock, by normal use of dwelling

title: Schools - Attainment by Deprivation
notes: The average total tariff score, and percentage of school leavers by Scottish Index of Multiple Deprivation (SIMD) Quintile

title: Schools - Attainment for All
notes: School leaver average total tariff score: grouped into the lowest 20%, middle 60% and highest 20% of attainers for each school

title: Schools - Leaver Count
notes: The number of school leavers for each establishment, by year

title: Schools - Positive Leaver Destinations
notes: The percentage of school leavers going to a 'positive destination' on leaving school

title: Schools - Literacy and Numeracy
notes: The percentage of school leavers attaining literacy and numeracy at SCQF level 4 or better and SCQF level 5 or better

title: Education establishments
notes: Reference information on schools and other types of educational establishments.

title: Schools - Breadth and Depth of Qualifications
notes: The range of qualifications taken by school pupils and the level at which they are achieved

title: Population Projections (2016-based)
notes: Population projections for Scotland and Scottish Areas, based on 2016 population estimates. Please see the Population Projections (2018-based) dataset for the most up-to-date projections.

title: Children in Families with Limited Resources
notes: Percent of children in families that have both low income and cannot afford three or more out of a list of 22 basic necessities.

title: Local Authority Housing Stock by Type
notes: Local Authority owned housing stock, by type of dwelling

title: Household Financial Management - Scottish Household Survey
notes: How households in Scotland manage financially, from the Scottish Household Survey (SHS)

title: Community Ownership â Area of Land
notes: Area of land in community ownership (hectares)

title: Life Expectancy
notes: Life expectancy in years, at birth and for age groups

title: Land and Buildings Transaction Tax Revenues
notes: Land and Buildings Transaction Tax revenues by month of submission, type of transaction, type of property and total consideration. Additional Dwelling Supplement revenue and repayments claimed by month of submission are also provided.

title: Land and Buildings Transaction Tax Notifiable Transactions
notes: Land and Buildings Transaction Tax (LBTT) notifiable transactions by month of submission, type of transaction, type of property and total consideration. LBTT notifiable transactions in which Additional Dwelling Supplement was declared due by month of submission are also provided.

title: Local Authority Housing Stock by Age
notes: Local Authority owned housing stock, by age of dwelling

title: Community Ownership â Number of Community Groups
notes: Number of community groups that own assets

title: Community Ownership â Number of Assets
notes: Number of assets in community ownership

title: Business Enterprise Research and Development Expenditure
notes: Expenditure and employment on research and development by businesses in Scotland since 2001.

title: Business Demography - Survival
notes: Number and rate (percent) of VAT/PAYE business survival.

title: Dwelling Disrepair (Scottish House Condition Survey)
notes: The proportion of households with any (basic) disrepair, disrepair to critical elements, urgent disrepair or extensive disrepair to their dwelling, by dwelling types,  household characteristics and council area. Derived from the Scottish House Condition Survey (SHCS).

title: Area improvement - Scottish Household Survey
notes: If local neighbourhood has improved over the last three years, from the Scottish Household Survey (SHS)

title: Community belonging - Scottish Household Survey
notes: How strongly adults in Scotland feel they belong to their immediate neighbourhood, from the Scottish Household Survey (SHS)

title: Local Authority Services and Performance - Scottish Household Survey
notes: Percentage of adults who agree with various statements about local authority services and performance, from the Scottish Household Survey (SHS)

title: Exports by Industry
notes: Scottish international exports and Scottish exports to the rest of the UK broken down by industry sector.

title: Local Authority Housing Lettings
notes: Lettings of local authority dwellings, by local authority

title: Domestic Energy Performance Certificates - Dataset to Q2 2021
notes: Management Information: environmental data on the Domestic Energy Performance Certificate (EPC) and Recommendations Report for each current record held on the Scottish EPC Register from Q4 2012 to Q2 2021.  Data extracted July 2021.

title: Non-domestic Energy Performance Certificates - Dataset to Q2 2021
notes: Management Information: environmental data on Non-domestic Energy Performance Certificate (EPC) and Recommendations Report for each current record held on the Scottish EPC Register from Q1 2013 to Q2 2021.  Data extracted July 2021.

title: Discretionary Housing Payments Applications
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Number of applications received by Local Authorities for Discretionary Housing Payments

title: Discretionary Housing Payments Determinations
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Number of determinations (decisions to make or not make an award) made by Local Authorities on Discretionary Housing Payments applications.

title: Discretionary Housing Payments Awards
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Number of awards made by Local Authorities for Discretionary Housing Payments.

title: Discretionary Housing Payments Expenditure
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Amount spent by Local Authorities on awards for Discretionary Housing Payments

title: Educational attainment of school leavers
notes: The score is based on school leaversâ highest level of qualification, averaged across all leavers within a data zone.

title: Gross Expenditure on Research and Development
notes: Gross Expenditure on Research and Development in Scotland since 2001.

title: Settlements and Localities Population
notes: Mid-year population estimates for built-up areas of Scotland.

title: Distance to Nearest Green or Blue Space (National Indicator)
notes: Percentage of adults living within 5 minutes walking distance of their nearest green or blue space

title: Local Authority Vacant Dwellings
notes: Local authority vacant stock: as at 31 March each year, by current status and length of vacancy

title: Local Authority Vacant Dwellings (vacancies arising during the year)
notes: Number of Local Authority dwellings falling vacant during the year and which are available for reletting (whether or not relet)

title: Household Projections of Average Household Size
notes: 25 year projection of household size (people per household) for Council Areas, Health Board areas, and National Parks. The data given here is part of the same projection shown in Household Projections, which shows a more detailed breakdown of the projection

title: Household Projections
notes: 25 year projection of households for Council Areas, Health Board Areas, and National Parks. The data is broken down by the household reference person age and the type of household

title: Gender Employment Gap
notes: The difference between the employment rates for men and women (aged 16-64).

title: Net Migration
notes: Net migration by age, sex, council area and year.

title: Migration To and From Scotland
notes: Migration to and from Scotland by single year of age, sex and year.

title: Self Employment
notes: Self Employment level and ratio (aged 16 and over).

title: Labour Productivity: Annual
notes: The average amount of economic output produced per job and per hour worked in Scotland.

title: Labour Productivity: Quarterly
notes: The average amount of economic output produced per job and per hour worked in Scotland

title: Child Benefit - Families
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes: Geographical analysis of families claiming Child Benefit at small area levels. Number of families in a live Child Benefit award as at 31st August.

title: Alcohol Related Hospital Statistics
notes: The alcohol-related inpatient and day case activity taking place within general acute hospitals and psychiatric hospitals in Scotland.

title: Business Stocks and Sites by Urban Rural Classification
notes: Number of VAT/PAYE registered stocks and sites operating in Scotland by Urban Rural Classification

title: Business Stocks and Sites by Region of Ownership
notes: Number of VAT/PAYE registered stocks and sites operating in Scotland by region of ownership

title: Delayed Discharges - Monthly Bed Days Occupied
notes: Number of bed days occupied by hospital inpatients who are ready for discharge, but whose discharge has been delayed.

title: Living Wage
notes: Number and percentage of employees earning less than the living wage, based on workplace local authority

title: Underemployment
notes: People who are in work but who would prefer to work more hours for the same rate of pay

title: Distance to Green or Blue Space - Scottish Household Survey
notes: Percentage of adults living within various walking distances to their nearest green or blue space

title: Neighbourhood safety when walking alone - Scottish Household Survey
notes: How safe adults in Scotland feel when walking alone in their neighbourhood after dark, from the Scottish Household Survey (SHS)

title: Feeling safe when alone at home - Scottish Household Survey
notes: How safe adults in Scotland feel when alone in their home at night, from the Scottish Household Survey (SHS)

title: Scottish Landfill Tax
notes: Scottish Landfill Tax (SLfT) revenues and contributions to the Scottish Landfill Communities Fund by quarter. The associated waste disposals by SLfT rate, the number of SLfT returns received and the number of landfill sites covered by these returns is also provided.

title: Involvement with people in the neighbourhood - Scottish Household Survey
notes: Percentage of adults who agree with various statements about involvement with people in their neighbourhood, from the Scottish Household Survey (SHS)

title: Carer's Allowance Supplement
category: Economic Activity, Benefits and Tax Credits
notes:
Carerâs Allowance Supplement payments- number, percentage and expenditure. 
National values are broken down by age, gender and local authority.

title: 6-in-1 Immunisation
notes: Number and percent of children who have completed their primary immunisation course of the 6-in-1 vaccine by 24 months of age. The 6-in-1 vaccine replaced the 5-in-1 vaccine in the routine childhood immunisation schedule from 1 October 2017.

title: Supply, Use and Input-Output Tables
notes:
Covering the period 1998-2018, these tables provide a complete picture of the flows of products in the Scottish onshore economy for a given year. 

They detail the relationship between producers and consumers and the interdependencies of industries.

title: Data Zone Lookup
notes: Geography lookup tables used for aggregation, from 2011 data zones to higher level geographies

notes: Number and rate (per 10,000 people) of services registered to provide early learning and childcare

title: Early Learning and Childcare: Children Registered
notes: Number and rate (per 100 children) of children registered to attend early learning and childcare services

title: Community Payback Orders: Commenced
notes: Community payback orders commenced in each year from 2011-12 by age group and gender.

notes: The number and percentage of long stay residents by various health characteristics and those requiring nursing care, for different main client groups.

notes: The percentage of long stay care home residents by length of their stay, as well as mean and median lengths of stay

notes: The weekly charges and sources of funding for long stay care home residents, with and without nursing care. All data is for care homes whose main client group is aged 65 years and older.
